title: The Princes of Malibu
overview: The series followed Brandon and Brody Jenner, the adult sons of Olympic champion Bruce Jenner and former Miss Tennessee Linda Thompson. On permanent vacation, the brothers lived with Linda and her husband, David Foster, in Foster's Malibu estate. Linda spoiled the boys, treated them as though they could do no wrong, while Foster wanted the "freeloaders" to get jobs and straighten their lives out. With their friend Spencer Pratt, the boys got themselves into various hijinks.
